title: Print/letterhead, "Letterhead for Globe Leat", 1962
inscribed: Imprinted Globe Leather logo in black and orange ink at upper right: G [with orange circle and black lines to look like a globe at the center of the G]. In black ink at upper left: GLOBE LEATHER CORPORATION In orange ink at upper left: 432 Park Avenue South, New York 16, N.Y. Oregon 9-9240 Cable: Globeskins New York At lower left: MEMBERS OF THE TANNERS COUNCIL OF AMERICA
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
